name: Haunted Mansion (itch) (KatieHill)
description:
Haunted Mansion

Experience a spine chilling entirely custom environment created using 3ds Max, Photoshop and Unity. This project is a walk-through environment with no game-play elements and is designed to display the developers skills in the programs used to create it. 

Developed by: Katie Hill

Developed for: University of the Sunshine Coast
